languages.text: "Испытываю обеспокоенность касательно судьбы архимагоса Амарната. По данным Оптикона-22, он пропал после инцидента на механическом ковчеге "Герметико". Информация о данном корабле и его гибели удалена из архивов. Допускаю, что инцидент на корабле, сокрытие данных и покушение являются частями единого заговора".

"I am concerned about the fate of Archmagos Amarnat. According to Opticon-22, he went missing in the wake of the incident on an Ark Mechanicus, the Hermetico. Information about that ship and its perishing has been purged from the archives. I accept the possibility that the incident on the ship, the concealed data, and the assassination have all been part of a single conspiracy."
languages.original_text: "Испытываю обеспокоенность касательно судьбы архимагоса Амарната. По данным Оптикона-22, он пропал после инцидента на механическом ковчеге "Герметико". Информация о данном корабле и его гибели удалена из архивов. Допускаю, что инцидент на корабле, сокрытие данных и покушение являются частями единого заговора".

I find it possible that the incident on the ship, the concealed data, and the assassination have all been part of a single conspiracy."

I accept the possibility that the incident on the ship, the concealed data, and the assassination have all been part of a single conspiracy."

languages.text: “我对阿玛纳特大贤者的命运感到担忧。根据奥普蒂孔22号的说法，他在机械方舟‘隐士之舟’号发生事故之后就销声匿迹了。所有关于那艘船以及船只罹难的信息，都从档案库中被清除了。我愿意接受这样的可能性——机械方舟上的事故、那些被隐瞒的数据，以及这次刺杀行动，都是某个阴谋的一部分。”
languages.original_text: "I am concerned about the fate of Archmagos Amarnat. According to Opticon-22, he went missing in the wake of the incident on an Ark Mechanicus, the Hermetico. Information about that ship and its perishing has been purged from the archives. I accept the possibility that the incident on the ship, the concealed data, and the assassination have all been part of a single conspiracy."

traits.locale_text: “我对阿玛纳特大贤者的命运感到担忧。根据奥普蒂孔22号的说法，他在机械方舟‘隐士之舟’号发生事故之后就销声匿迹了。所有关于那艘船以及船只罹难的信息，都从档案库中被清除了。我愿意接受这样的可能性——机械方舟上的事故、那些被隐瞒的数据，以及这次刺杀行动，都是某个阴谋的一部分。”

languages.text: «Me preocupa el destino del Archimagos Amarnat. Según Opticon-22, desapareció tras el incidente en un Arca del Mechanicus, la Hermetico. La información sobre esa nave y su destrucción ha sido purgada de los archivos. Acepto la posibilidad de que dicho incidente, la ocultación de los datos y el asesinato sean todo parte de una misma conspiración».
languages.original_text: "I am concerned about the fate of Archmagos Amarnat. According to Opticon-22, he went missing in the wake of the incident on an Ark Mechanicus, the Hermetico. Information about that ship and its perishing has been purged from the archives. I accept the possibility that the incident on the ship, the concealed data, and the assassination have all been part of a single conspiracy."

traits.locale_text: «Me preocupa el destino del Archimagos Amarnat. Según Opticon-22, desapareció tras el incidente en un Arca del Mechanicus, el Hermético. La información sobre esa nave y su destrucción ha sido purgada de los archivos. Acepto la posibilidad de que dicho incidente, la ocultación de los datos y el asesinato sean todo parte de una misma conspiración».

languages.text: 「大賢人アマルナトの運命が気がかりだ。オプティコン-22によると、彼はアーク・メカニカスのヘルメティコで起きた事件の後、行方不明になっている。その消息を絶った船に関する情報はアーカイブから消去されている。私は、この船の事件、隠されたデータ、そして暗殺が、すべてひとつの陰謀の一部であった可能性を考えている」
languages.original_text: "I am concerned about the fate of Archmagos Amarnat. According to Opticon-22, he went missing in the wake of the incident on an Ark Mechanicus, the Hermetico. Information about that ship and its perishing has been purged from the archives. I accept the possibility that the incident on the ship, the concealed data, and the assassination have all been part of a single conspiracy."

traits.locale_text: 「大賢人アマルナトの運命が気がかりだ。オプティコン-22によると、彼はアーク・メカニカスのヘルメティコで起きた事件の後、行方不明になっている。その消息を絶った船に関する情報はアーカイブから消去されている。私は、この船の事件、隠されたデータ、そして暗殺が、すべてひとつの陰謀の一部であった可能性を考えている」

languages.text: "Ich sorge mich um Erzmagos Amarnat. Laut Opticon-22 verschwand er nach dem Zwischenfall auf einer Mechanicus-Arche, der Hermetico. Informationen über dieses Schiff und seinen Niedergang wurden aus den Archiven gelöscht. Ich akzeptiere die Möglichkeit, dass der Zwischenfall auf dem Schiff, die verschleierten Daten und das Attentat allesamt Teil derselben Verschwörung sind."
languages.original_text: "I am concerned about the fate of Archmagos Amarnat. According to Opticon-22, he went missing in the wake of the incident on an Ark Mechanicus, the Hermetico. Information about that ship and its perishing has been purged from the archives. I accept the possibility that the incident on the ship, the concealed data, and the assassination have all been part of a single conspiracy."

traits.locale_text: "Ich sorge mich um Erzmagos Amarnat. Laut Opticon-22 verschwand er nach dem Zwischenfall auf einer Mechanicus-Arche, der Hermetico. Informationen über dieses Schiff und seinen Niedergang wurden aus den Archiven gelöscht. Ich akzeptiere die Möglichkeit, dass der Zwischenfall auf dem Schiff, die verschleierten Daten und das Attentat allesamt Teil derselben Verschwörung sind."

languages.text: « Je m'inquiète du sort de l'archimagos Amarnat. D'après l'unité Opticon-22, il a disparu après cet incident sur une arche Mechanicus, l'Hermetico. Les informations relatives à ce vaisseau et à sa destruction ont été supprimées des archives. J'accepte la possibilité que l'incident sur le vaisseau, les données dissimulées et l'assassinat fassent partie d'une seule et même conspiration. »
languages.original_text: "I am concerned about the fate of Archmagos Amarnat. According to Opticon-22, he went missing in the wake of the incident on an Ark Mechanicus, the Hermetico. Information about that ship and its perishing has been purged from the archives. I accept the possibility that the incident on the ship, the concealed data, and the assassination have all been part of a single conspiracy."

traits.locale_text: « Je m'inquiète du sort de l'archimagos Amarnat. D'après l'unité Opticon-22, il a disparu après cet incident sur une arche Mechanicus, l'Hermetico. Les informations relatives à ce vaisseau et à sa destruction ont été supprimées des archives. J'accepte la possibilité que l'incident sur le vaisseau, les données dissimulées et l'assassinat fassent partie d'une seule et même conspiration. »

languages.original_text: "I am concerned about the fate of Archmagos Amarnat. According to Opticon-22, he went missing in the wake of the incident on an Ark Mechanicus, the Hermetico. Information about that ship and its perishing has been purged from the archives. I accept the possibility that the incident on the ship, the concealed data, and the assassination have all been part of a single conspiracy."

languages.text: "Başmagos Amarnat'a ne olduğu konusunda endişeliyim. Opticon-22'ye göre Hermetico isimli Ark Mechanicus'ta yaşanan olayın başlangıcında kayıplara karışmış. Gemi ve ortadan yok oluşu hakkındaki bilgiler, arşivlerden temizlenmiş. Gemideki olayın, gizlenmiş verinin ve suikastın; tek bir komplonun parçaları olduğu ihtimalinin varlığını kabul etmekteyim."
languages.original_text: "I am concerned about the fate of Archmagos Amarnat. According to Opticon-22, he went missing in the wake of the incident on an Ark Mechanicus, the Hermetico. Information about that ship and its perishing has been purged from the archives. I accept the possibility that the incident on the ship, the concealed data, and the assassination have all been part of a single conspiracy."

traits.locale_text: "Başmagos Amarnat'a ne olduğu konusunda endişeliyim. Opticon-22'ye göre Hermetico isimli Ark Mechanicus'ta yaşanan olayın başlangıcında kayıplara karışmış. Gemi ve ortadan yok oluşu hakkındaki bilgiler arşivlerden temizlenmiş. Gemideki olayın, gizlenmiş verinin ve suikastın, tek bir komplonun birer parçası oldukları ihtimalinin varlığını kabul etmekteyim."
